author: D R

comment:
Not that it matters, but being american Indian, we have mostly been outsiders looking into american society and the behaviors of white people, for lack of a better term. It is just my observation that the society is suffering from a collective mental illness. It's very sad. For us as a people, the results are more angering. There is an astounding blanket of so much deception. This particular instance of what is happening to Johnny Depp strikes at the heart of what we observe in this society. The motives of A H are so clear - a woman whose character is without real depth of caring and a core of values that reflect no depth of feeling for others. No real self examination. Purely self-centered. Apparently fame and money her truest goals. What I wonder is how did she BECOME such a person? Throw in her violent behavior.  You could honestly observe she is evil because she appears to have no conscience for her behaviors. 

It appears she had picked Johnny Depp out for scheming a way to become famous and set up a way to go after his money. Her own words gave her away from how she worked so hard to get to a wedding with him. Then in just a month after that wedding she is in violent conflict with him. Setting up a continual scheming to carry out her  goal through to divorce and the $$ she would receive. 

Before Johnny Depp, whoever really heard of her?  In all the videos of her and Mr. Depp on so many red carpets with camera's flashing, she shows a complete arrogance of self next to a very humble looking husband, who is really the important one for all the attention. You can see she is saturated with the self attention being brought THROUGH Johnny Depp. Just exactly as she wanted.

She is clever, cunning, sly, devious, and amoral apparently. I see many opinions about her state of mental illness - which may be valid - but I see what Jerry Judge saw - she knew(knows) exactly what she is doing. Which makes her evil for the cruelty she shows to Johnny Depp and to many others. She is a predator in the true sense of the word. And none of us are immune from becoming victims of predators. It takes time to discover the real condition of the human heart. And too many do not take or allow that time. I can only assume Mr. Depp has learned a hard personal lesson. In our day and time, trust and truth are values of rarity. We humans are the cause.
Hoping Mr. Depp gets the justice he so deserves from the theft of his dignity and truth and all the personal ashes of that theft by this one very premeditating person.
author: Deennaa W.

comment: Johnny is so beloved. My thoughts are not going to be popular here. Amber has, in addition to adding drugs to the mix, a personality disorder in full gear. Either BPD, which reacts when they feel abandoned or Bipolar II (which is not a personality disorder but an Axis 1 diagnosis and commonly requires the right medication) which is hallmarked by rage. Then you add coke and all those other drugs to the mix and you have an atomic bomb. You're going to get lies, rage, displacing blame, and a whole other slew of dysfunctional behaviors. Even though she recorded this probably hoping she would sound innocent, her issues are crystal clear. I hope Amber realizes her actions and responsibilities and receives help. However, in 25 years of marriage counseling, no one is all wrong or is all right in a relationship. Johnny left his devoted wife of 25 years for this woman, this much younger (unstable) woman. There was bound to be some karmic consequence. I have seen this over and over again. I think he realizes that. As a professional, I would have said the same thing he did, that as long as there's violence, they cannot remain together. They would have to separate and receive separate help. She could have ended up killing him in a rage. Thank goodness that didn't happen. I wish him healing between him and his ex-wife as well as their children. As an actor, he is brilliant and I hope that he will continue successfully in his career.

comment:
Making no judgements, simply pointing out that Seroquel is medication that someone does not use casually. It is used to treat mental and mood disorders including Schizophrenia, Bi Polar disorder and Bi Polar mania resulting from Bi Polar disorder. It's a medication only prescribed by doctors to patients who have been diagnosed with one of the conditions mentioned and even then, only in cases were a clear mood disorder is present. The medication can have adverse side affects on the liver, kidneys and blood vessels and patients taking Seroquel are required to have their blood monitored the entire time they take the medication. For all those reasons, no reputable physician would prescribed that drug simply for its anesthetic affect due to the many risks associated with taking the drug. That being said there seem to be only 2 logical conclusions one can come to; either the drug was obtained from a less then ethical physician or someone in the home was prescribed the drug to treat a legitimate  mental disorder with associated mood disorder. When the doctor said "I'd approve 100mg....give her 50", he was clearly recognized that the drug has a calming and eventual anesthetic  affect which he felt she needed. When the nurse offered her 50mg she was returned to say "She won't take 50, she will take 25, she normally takes 25". 
  Again, no judgement, just an observation.

comment:
I actively try to avoid news about celebrities and as a result, I know virtually nothing about celebrities and their private lives apart from what I hear from my friends or read on the cover of magazines. So when my friends told me that Johnny Depp was a domestic abuser and I started seeing headlines that Johnny Depp was reportedly 'out of control', 'violent', 'abusing drugs', and physically abusing his wife, I took them at their word. I didn't want it to be true, because I liked Depp as an actor and person, but I did start to privately think of him as a wife beater even if I never said it aloud. 
However, it wasn't until I heard that Depp had severed part of his finger as a result of Amber allegedly throwing a bottle at him. That was the moment that everything changed for me and more importantly it was the moment I began to think that Johnny Depp was the real victim of domestic violence and his wife was the abuser. I can't believe I was so late in knowing about that. Yet since then I have been following this story (and I NEVER follow stories on celebrities). Looking back, I wish I had made an effort to learn more about this case for myself earlier but then again I had my own problems I was focusing on at the time. I am glad I was never a defender of Amber's (in part, because I didn't even know who she was) nor did I ever bash anyone who continued to side with Depp. 
That being said, I feel terrible for Depp for having to go through all of this abuse (mentally, emotionally, verbally, and physically it seems) and yet he was the one cast as the abuser and he was the one whose career has suffered as a result. It's disgusting and it's not fair! I guess I just really want to say that I am sorry that I was so late in coming to Depp's defense in all of this. I have been doing what I can to try and clear his name though ever since I found out how abusive Amber was. Mainly, I've been actively trying to tell people the truth about how Depp was actually the victim of domestic violence as well as how much of a liar and an abuser Amber was. It's my way of helping to clear his name, however small, and any small effort to help Depp is important too. :)

comment:
You sent me this link to help me see you point of view that amber Is the one in the wrong. This audio clearly shows Johnny did it, regardless of the fingertip. His security guard starts by saying "he's totally trashed this place" before hastily correcting himself and trying to insinuate it might be amber. He then details the amount of alcohol and drugs Johnny has taken, no person could take the much stuff and be in control of their actions. His head of security is not suprised by this, has even thought Johnny might end up ODing. His head of security is trying to protect his "asset" which is Johnny, by triangulating the various people he speaks to on the phone and put the idea down she may have done it. He describes the carnage on the floor, the yelling from him, how he threw bottles and broke windows. If he cut his finger because of glass he broke, tough shit. That poor woman, they are trying to control with medication. She is in a nest of vipers. It's a classic tactic used by abusers, to try to get their partner on psych medication as they can point to it when the shit hits the fan, also the partners tend to end up needing this medication because of the techniques and psych trauma caused by the abuser / addict. I know what that head of security is doing, my ex was in the special forces, it's CLASSIC. Seriously, anyone that high up in security will be well versed in understanding and deploying these tactics without a thought for the victim. Fucking awful situation for amber. Him down playing her "scratches" on the phone, is just another subversive tactic to cast doubt on her to someone who hasn't seen her to protect his asset. Its also why he needs her out of there as quick as possible as her story won't match the series of events he wants to spin. He needs to control the narrative, she's a mess, it's not an act, she's not in control, he is. The amount of glass which be heard being brushed across the floor, it's highly likely, given the drug and alcohol cocktail he took, that her version of events is correct.
As a victim, in the aftermath, all you care about is not losing the one you love, despite what they've done, sometimes you will admit things you didn't do to try to defend them and not lose the one you love because there is so much pain already you can't take anymore. Surely you've seen that? Women who don't leave abusive partners, who defend them who seem confused?
This audio has convinced me beyond doubt Johnny was the aggressor and he had a highly skilled team trying to protect him
It's called trauma bonding where the brain is forced between high adrenslised States and high dopamine states. You almost always see it in partners of addicts/narcs. They end up with PTSD .

This audio indicates narcissism by Heard with her blaming Depp for everything but having admitted that she initiated the physical abuse, throwing a bottle at him which has severed the tip of his finger, and also throwing other items, from pot and pans to a vase, and other objects at the tv set, at Depp. She claims Depp needs her yet she also cries that she doesn't want to "lose" Johnny. AH's conduct in court shows her to be a liar. Her behaviour i strongly suggestive of deceitfulness and she takes out something to eat in order to delay answering a lawyer's questions. Even her own lawyer recognises that his client is coming across as someone making up a story as she goes along and calls repeatedly for breaks. Other audio recordings by Heard indicate that Depp would leave the room when she became violent and she would get angry and call him a "coward" for refusing to stay around for her to physically abuse and yell at. None of her actions suggest she was abused. The cut or cuts on he arm look like those made by people who self-injure, usually with a razor blade. comment:
I usually don't comment on these type of things (only my second time) but felt the need to today. So a few things...

There are a Lot of reasons victims stay with their abusers. Why he stayed with her only he knows. You can't control who you fall for and abusers can be very charming in the beginning.

It seems to me there is something traumatic in Amber's past. After all its called the cycle of abuse for a reason. Until she addresses it, and the behavior she then replicates on others the cycle will continue.

The first part of addressing a problem is admitting there is one. 

Another thing. Whether he is on drugs and drinking or not, that does in no way validate her treatment of him. Are some of you f***king kidding me right now?!

Also drugs and alcohol effect everyone differently. Some are violent, some sedated, depressed, the list goes on. There is zero justification for stating that due to his use of both he is the one more likely to be violent.

We all have our crutches and have no right to judge him for his, really some of you?! 

I never believed he laid a hand on her. The signs just aren't there. 

I hope that he is vindicated but most of all I wish him good health and happiness. I doubt it but I hope that some point in this process this will be a wakeup call for her and she gets the help she needs.

Before she destroys another person or herself.

I strongly believe she maybe has borderline syndrome.... here is the wiki explanation. 
Borderline personality disorder (BPD), also known as emotionally unstable personality disorder is a mental illness characterized by a long-term pattern of unstable relationships, distorted sense of self, and strong emotional reactions. author: IDIOTdella

comment:
Wtf... first time I've listened to this one and it blows my mind how on earth any court case could even get started. I really hope Depp takes this vindictive, egotistical, greedy lunatic and crushes it - metaphorically.  The words he used at the start 'I know what you are and who you are' broke my heart. I used exactly that statement,  word for word, in the final confrontation I had with my ex abuser. I still remember the details like it was yesterday, I still remember how I felt.  So betrayed, hurt, disappointed, full of rage, humiliated.... ugh. The statement was borne out of the final epiphany that I was dealing with a true narcissistic abuser that despised me and who would do anything to keep hurting me over and over ... and furthermore,  that they would enjoy watching me suffer. You never forget those moments of clarity in what can otherwise just be a blur of confusion.

Listening to it 'cry' in the background made me feel physically sick. I just wanted to slap its stupid face. Repeatedly. With a big stick. Jonny must have the emotional control of a saint to have never raised a hand to the thing,  instead taking out his rage on inanimate objects. Had it not been for the fact that I spent all my spare time listening to hypnosis tapes and literature on narcissistic personality disorder, I'd probably have trashed a few things too. The only trashing of my house was done by my abuser,  he liked to 'accidentally' break my things. Funny how his stuff was never 'accidentally' dropped etc.

 Man! This one really hit home for me. If I needed any further validation that Jonny is on the side of right , this audio is it.

author: Hellboy

comment: Hi, please  understand I love the way you are covering this, but please be careful using words like 'manic episode'. I have bipolar disorder and while it's true that we can become angry in the midst of an episode there's too much in her behaviour that doesn't fit. Her outbursts seem centered around issues of abandonment, and emotional dysregulation. Of course I am not a doctor, but, if eventually she did get diagnosed, my money would be on Borderline Personality Disorder.. Even then, people with this disorder don't always act out in such a scary, destructive way and they suffer a lot, with a high suicide rate. Maybe she is just a selfish manipulator - who knows for sure. But on YouTube please don't contribute to a lot of the discrimination that we have to endure from the public. Life is bloody hard with any mental illness and there is so much misinformation around. Anyway, thanks for putting so much time and effort to get the truth out there. Thanks for reading this essay!

comment:
Unbelievable how these so -called "adults"  ...   Amber and Johnny ...   have so much wealth they are totally nursemaided   -  wallowing indolently in lavish seven star luxury accomodation, over-indulging  in every  hedonistic whim like decadent, spoilt children ...  paying an army of  "addiction specialists" ,  therapists, security staff,  domestic personnel and no doubt michelin starred chefs to cook and clean and drive their drunk and drug-addled arses around in pampered privacy.   Not to forget the all-important personal  assistants who run around as 'fixers' with such bizarre job requirements as purchasing  replacement high-end furnishings for multi-million dollar mansions they lease and casually trash,  scoring whatever class A, B or C drug takes their fancy or scouring through pools of  blood and  the other detritus of a bender ... looking for (in this case) the sliced off  end of a finger ... lost in a drunken brawl  ffs. 

 They become so out-of-touch with how to behave as 'grown-ups' ... inured and insulated by vast amounts of money,   coddled and bubble-wrapped to "protect the golden-egg laying creative(s)"  of  the grim  consequences, responsibilities and gaze  of  the real world and how it functions ...  as minders take on the role of  Parents ...  scrabbling (metaphorically wiping their arses)  to minimise,  protect, clean up and firewall.

Providing 'damage control'  for their employer  ...   the money-maker Johnny,  who  every single job relies upon ... seems to define and determine the primary role of  most of the staff as heard in this phone tape.

We now know Amber Turd  is particularly toxic as her manipulation of the media and character assasination of Depp has  now been  revealed,  in conjunction with the  craven hijacking of the #metoo movement, which  was particularly offensive and aberrant.

As a direct consequence of Heard's  widely broadcast tale of  domestic abuse and horrors from  'he-who-will-not-be-named-but-we-all-know-who-I-mean ' , complete with close-ups of bruises and bogus lies which  became career-killing  claims,  means she  makes it so much harder than  ever for real survivors and current victims of domestic/sexual  violence to be believed (it is already fucking hard to be heard)   The narcissistic  self-aggrandisation and her apparent  "altruistic " intent  with her PSA's    as she was spruiking her  " I  can identify and speak out for this cause  as I,  too,  am a domestic violence survivor"  has now been revealed as a tawdry manipulation predicated on baseless lies.

 Unfortunately she has actually substantially damaged the #metoo movement by validating all  the misogynists and sexists within law enforcement who still  think in their private moments that we all ask for it anyway   It will be a little bit more  hard to be heard  thanks to  Amber Shits-On-Beds.

For that alone she should be castigated and blacklisted.  Her lies about Depp need to be exposed as widely as possible and  saturated in mainstream media as much as she dragged Depp's 'non-name'   through the mud and shit. What a despicable cunt.

comment:
Wow, I didn't realize that she actually has medically diagnosed mental health issues and she is on medication for them and under constant medical supervision ..the Dr. and Nurse on staff...

Yes, there's absolutely at no point anyone including herself mentioning her having any injuries of any sort. 
It is said that Johnny is of the upmost importance likely being he is the one injured, also likely because he is the employer.
With her being the instigator and or the problem the vast majority of the time, and because there's a Doctor and Nurse on staff, it seems like to me that they are always prepared for and anticipating some sort of "fight" be it verbal or physical. The Dr. and Nurse are there primarily for her "blow ups" and to immediately assess the situation and properly medicate her,  As well as being on hand in case Either of them overdoses, as it's clearly heard that they are partaking of "recreational street drugs" as well as heavily drinking alcohol. **Not a good situation or combination.**
Again there's absolutely at no point anyone including Amber herself making it known that she has sustained any injuries whatsoever minor or severe, nothing requiring a simple bandage or to be taken to the hospital for treatment...absolutely not a dickie birds mention of anything...You would expect that in her mental state..being somewhat normal and rational one moment and then crying and emotional the next, that if she had so much as a scratch on her that when she was "hyper emotional and crying" that she would be going on about any injuries...again when she was in a rational frame of mind if she was injured and needed some help from the Doctor and Nurse on staff that she would ask for it, they would obviously initiate and take care of any injuries that they could see, and if any injuries needed more serious attention then they could provide then they would insist that she go to the hospital for more in depth specialized medical treatment...BUT NOTHING was said by anyone at all!!!!
Throughout this entire process/case it's been made clear that Amber is mentally/emotionally unstable and physically/mentally/emotionally abusive to her romantic partners. I just wasn't aware that she was actually under Doctor's supervision and treatment. I really hope that by letting this audio information be "leaked" that she tries to say that it's not her fault that she abused Johnny and her ex-wife because of her "mental health issues/problems/illness" ..it might be a contributing factor BUT it's not an excuse or get out of jail free card either!
I truly hope that she gets more in depth medical attention/treatment for her conditions and that she is able to have happy healthy romantic relationships in the future, but as it stands for the moment, I feel badly for anyone who enters into a romantic relationship with her. As soon as something doesn't go her way, as soon as she is told no to something that she Really wants, or as soon as she just looses her temper over anything then the odds of her blowing up and hurting the person are great. Love shouldn't hurt!
Thank you for the video, I look forward to watching more on this and any other topics. 
üëèüëèüëèüëèüëèüëçü§óüá®üá¶

comment:
Also missing from the Drs report was any mention of the patient being slightly or heavily intoxicated. No mention of him being drugged. Blood and urine tests would have been taken, and he would have been stomach pumped, followed by him being infused with charcoal to prevent risk of coding from drugs. This is always noted in reports. The patient would not have been treated and released but instead observed in ICU. I  used to treat overdoses in the E.R and know the protocol like the back of my hand.

author: Kenza Bouayad

comment:
wow that are some meds that she is using , What is Seroquel?
Seroquel (quetiapine) is an antipsychotic medicine. It works by changing the actions of chemicals in the brain.
Seroquel is used to treat schizophrenia in adults and children who are at least 13 years old.
Seroquel is used to treat bipolar disorder (manic depression) in adults and children who are at least 10 years old.
Seroquel is also used together with antidepressant medications to treat major depressive disorder in adults.
https://www.drugs.com/seroquel.html

author: Michael Ptasnik

comment:
Thanks for your work in making this available and exposing evil hoaxers.
In Queensland, where this recording was made, it is not illegal to secretly record a conversation that one is part of. That she left the recording running for 5 hours to record other people's conversation is illegal.
Heard's evidence list from August 2016 included "Collective audio tapes and transcripts relating to communications between the parties in 2015 and 2016" and "Video/Audio of respondent speaking to petitioner in 2016 at parties' residence". 
I (not a lawyer) would expect that any audio or video that was recorded illegally should be inadmissible in a court case. Heard's divorce lawyer would have expected the kitchen video and this audio to be inadmissible and I presume put it on the list as intimidation tactic and to fuel speculation that Heard had proof.
The audio when Heard admits to throwing pots and pans could be admissible as they both knew it was recorded. 
I would expect that audio & video will continue to be inadmissible as evidence in the defamation cases.

comment:
Wait..I'm NO fan of Amber, BUT why would Johnny have "paint" on His finger if He hadn't written "easy Amber" in paint and blood, on the wall of a home they were staying at?? This audio seems to Definitely be a separate incident from the time She smashed Johnny's finger with the vodka bottle, as His hand/finger is Already in bandages. The Dr in the audio is also already aware that Johnny's finger bone has Already been "shattered". He couldn't of known that unless it happened previous to this occasion, and had already received medical attention.. Be explicitly states- Johnny has removed the tip of the finger, whilst the finger/hand was/is already bandaged, (presumably from the earlier "vodka bottle" attack)
I'm not sticking up for Amber. I just think the FULL truth should be disclosed. From this audio, it seems both Amber AND Johnny had a Huge, violent fight, which culminated in the whole house being trashed by them BOTH. Amber Is a liar, but Johnny is Not a 100% innocent either (no, I don't believe he sexually abused Amber). It seems they Were Both in an extremely toxic relationship, and brought the worst out in each other..add drugs/alcohol to that mix and, You get explosive fights like this one.. The biggest issue is that Amber has lied through her teeth from the start, making Johnny out to be a monster and Her a sweet, innocent angel. Something Amber is Not!!

comment:
As someone who‚Äôs currently dealing with an abusive husband I can say this really really shattered my heart and I feel soooo fucking bad for Johnny because I get him. This is how abusers act, they hurt the ones they ‚Äúlove‚Äù and then cry about it and then turn it against them later. They‚Äôll beg for the abused to come back and we will comply because they‚Äôre crying and begging and we know we once loved this person and we don‚Äôt wanna hurt them by saying no... it‚Äôs such a fucked up cycle. I have stayed this long with my husband not because I love him, I actually fucking hate him but because we have a 9 month old daughter and I just have soooo much guilt of having her grow up without a dad and people don‚Äôt help. I‚Äôve got people telling me she‚Äôs better off without him and others telling me it‚Äôs not her fault so why should I force her to live without a father? That she will hate me in the future for it. 

Currently I‚Äôve left my house that I paid for and he‚Äôs staying in and I‚Äôm living with my mom... I wasn‚Äôt able to get any of my stuff or her stuff from the house and I‚Äôm grateful that I‚Äôve left a few things at my moms for her but I‚Äôve been wearing the same pjs for 4 days already. I can‚Äôt even go to fucking court to get full custody of my child and a divorce because everything is closed here. So I‚Äôm currently just dealing with his million messages and phone calls, one minute he‚Äôs saying sorry and he didn‚Äôt mean it the next he‚Äôs swearing at me and threatening me and telling me it‚Äôs my fault. 

I truly hope this girl gets locked up and Johnny recovers from this.

comment:
She makes me physically ill. She's a complete lunatic. Brian you are the only place that I can come to for news on this. You are the only person who doesn't make this about anything else than what it is. You keep your own political opinions or opinions on women in general out of your videos. I really appreciate that what you do is the facts and that's it, you don't cloud it with opinions. Allowing us to draw our own conclusions and see Amber for the demon that she is. Nobody else reporting on this is doing that. They're all unwittingly helping Amber get away with this by turning off people who come to find out the truth by insulting liberals and women. This isn't about politics. This isn't about all women. This about Amber and Johnny and the fact that she tried to pull an elaborate hoax using her looks to con a man out of his money. I'm sure that's why Johnny actually follows you on Instagram. You aren't attacking people. The mainstream media is afraid to report on this because of people like I mentioned earlier. They are afraid that its going to hurt real women in real danger bc thx to the monster that Amber is, its going to make it harder for real abuse victims to be believed. I am not a violent person, I suffered from domestic violence in the shoes of the woman and the child when seeing my own mother suffer. I swore I would never become her and I did. Domestic violence is a real issue, their marriage really DID have a huge domestic violence issue its just that Amber isn't the victim she's the abuser. Something that abusers tend to do. My own child has a strained relationship with her father as I did with mine bc of the mirrored nightmare of knowing the truth but watching those abusers open their mouths and cry the victim like we didn't live the truth first hand. When people abuse, in their head from what I have seen, its never their fault. "You made me do it" "it's your fault". In order to have civil contact with these people you have to not burst their bubble of the fictional character that they created of themselves in their heads. I hate Amber so much for this. I wish I could see her face to face. Not for violence but to tell her what real abuse is. To let her know how many women she has endangered with this charade. It makes me so angry that I can't see straight. She's the worst kind of person. I don't hate anyone, I don't know her, and I hate her. For the abuse and pain she caused Johnny Depp and every single woman who has ever been, still being, and will ever be abused. I hope she goes to prison, I hope every cell mate she gets actually were abused by their partner. 
Sorry for the sidetracked part but seriously thank you Brian. You never once made this into a weapon against the people Amber duped with her nonsense. Because that's the reality of this situation. She duped the media, she duped actual abuse victims, she duped women. She has no respect for anyone. Everyone in her life was just a stepping stone. I really wish everyone would stop making this situation into a weapon against real victims. My biggest fear is that Johnny won't get the justice he deserves because Amber will get a pass in order to not hurt real victims more. At this point that's the damage control going on. They are not exposing & punishing Amber because of toxic people who are going to hurt real causes bc of it. All women are not Amber. All abusers are Amber. I really wish people would just make this about Johnny and Amber so that Johnny gets his justice and vindication and Amber gets her consequences and humiliation. But no, every one is all "feminazi" this and "libtard" that and so this is going to get swept under the rug in order to not discredit real victims and cause them more suffering. It makes me livid. Its Juicy SmoyYay all over again. Why do they THIS?!? Their selfishness and greed and evil personalities are going unpunished to protect real victims from real abusers. Basically what Trump supporters need to do is relax, stop making this about ALL people and make it about THAT PERSON so that THAT PERSON will be punished! JUST BECAUSE 1 PERSON LIED DOESN'T MEAN THAT WHAT THEY LIED ABOUT DOESN'T EXIST FOR OTHER PEOPLE! The mentality that 1 person gives them a pass to be racist and wife beaters with zero consequences is why the media won't report on it. Amber is a liar. Juicy is a liar. But there are actually men who physically mentally emotionally and sexually abuse women and just because that bitch lied doesn't mean all women are lying. Just like there are are actually racists and homophobes who harrass/assault real people and just because that bitch lied doesn't mean all victims of it are lying. So unless you want what happened with Juicy to happen to Amber, all toxic narratives have to stop and this needs to be done the way BRIAN is doing it. Because when it comes down to it the authorities are being given a choice... 1) punish this one pampered spoiled sociopathic exception to the rule and undercut/endanger the millions of other people in real situations or 2)sweep it under the rug and let that guilty person walk in order to ensure that the real victims that these crazy actors tried to emulate don't suffer anymore than they already have. It's an easy choice to make so we the people need to make sure that choice isn't necessary. These removed from reality rich pampered spoiled sociopaths are nothing like the actual victims who actually suffer and they shouldn't be used as weapons to hurt more people. This is coming from a black Bisexual liberal woman. I want Amber to pay for this, I want Juicy (Jussie Smollett) to pay for what he did! So please stop adding your own hang ups (other people, not Brian, Brian is doing this the right way and he should do Juicy next) because that is just letting these elitist criminals stay out of prison! I don't really care about whether someone is in my "tribe" I believe in right and wrong. Don't be like other people who are reporting on this like Yellow flash, umbrella guy, nerdettte newsstand. Be like Brian. Be like Brian so Amber can be punished all by her selfish self.
Edit: after 11:36 its clear that she is a monster and completely mentally unstable. She deserves prison so badly.

author: detchie

comment:
I have experienced pure evil such as this. My ex partner was exactly the same.
She also jumped on the #meetoo train, falsely accusing Harvey Weinstein a few years ago.

Before this, she had abused me over a 2 year period, controlling, coercing, belittling, humiliating, assaulting, threatening me with knives, and with false accusations.
I tried to leave many times, but she knew exactly how to manipulate me back in, faking overdoses, hospital tests and so on.
When I finally ended it, she tried to kill me, but I managed to get away. That's only part of what I went through, but it's left me with long term injuries.

Some wounds never fully heal, some cuts too deep. It's quite simply not possible for someone else to relate.

While this behaviour can be called an illness, there is evil there. A sadistic pleasure these people get from manipulating their victims, and getting away with it while trying to set _themselves_ up as victims. My ex often said she gets a power trip from manipulating vulnerable people, sexually and emotionally.

It is profoundly troubling that Hollywood and the identity politics community rushed to promote and protect abusers.

They've provided a global platform for abusers like Amber Heard and my ex to publicly shame and retraumatise their victims.

It is not let's say 'fashionable' for men to admit such things. So I can easily imagine what Johnny Depp has been through the past few years.

But if you haven't been through such a relationship you have no idea what it's like.

comment:
So I've been trying to think about why on earth she would record this and I think I may have figured out a potential reason. I think she recorded it because she wants to be able to hear what other people are saying about her without obviously eavesdropping on them - or, more likely, because she knows she can't when she's drugged. Even the one guy is aware that she likes to listen to what's being said, as he mentions it more than once. Anyway, this makes sense to me. I suspect she wanted to hear if anyone spoke poorly about her, or if they were saying anything that could allude to her getting in trouble for her actions. Not that it would do her much good to have this information but she obviously doesn't think things through properly to begin with, so... yeah. And, I think you're right on the money with cherry picking. I think she initially had recorded it for what I said but I think she ended up believing she could cherry pick it and try to spin this in her favor. Maybe that was part of the initial intent to begin with, even. I'm not sure. But this is my best guess.

Great work on your videos.

author: downunderwonder

comment: I don't usually comment on these videos and let me say off the bat, I am on Johnny's side in all of this but after hearing this audio when it was first released, I had some semblance of sympathy for Amber Heard. Seroquel is used to treat bipolar and I am a diagnosed bipolar 2 and though I've never tried seroquel I have tried other meds but to no avail so I've been treating myself with holistics, eating healthy etc. and with talk therapy for over 10 years. That doesn't always work and I still get the occasional manic episode. I've become violent in the past but never to this degree. I know that when a verbal altercation has happened in the past during mania, i might throw things (but never at other people) sometimes I hit (sometimes but very rarely another person, usually an inanimate object) and I know there is no excuse for that behavior. I am in no way excusing her abusive behavior, everyone with a mental illness needs to take responsibility for the treatment of their illness and the damage they cause. I know this is lengthy but, what I'm getting at is, mania affects memory. You can black out in long stretches of activity and only remember fragments or notions of events. Because what she did was so violent and she believes that he provoked her to violence, it makes sense that she would play the victim so as to let herself off the hook. The bit that is damning and speaks to her character as a person is all the flat out lying. You can have these lapses in sanity and victim shifting with mania but you can't tell tales of elaborate scenarios that didn't happen and not assume that it comes from a place of just being a bad person. I might think that I was in the right when I wasn't looking back on psychotic breaks but I didn't imagine and believe something so intricate actually happened when it didn't. I think she needs many years of psychological treatment, probably with proper medication use, without other drugs, and I hope she shows improvement but she can't flat out lie and continue to hurt other people with those lies anymore. Speaking from experience, psychological disorders are not an excuse to knowingly destroy other people and she needs to be held accountable.

comment:
I take the same medication she's been taking, Seroquel, for almost three years now and the closest I've been to being volatile  is talking a few octaves higher than my natural speaking voice; I can't even scream at someone. Just in case some of you don't know, don't be alarmed by the name of the medication that is listed as an "atypical antipsychotic". You don't have to be psychotic to take it. It treats some cases of schizophrenia, mania, and bipolar. I have bipolar type 2 which is a very subdued form of bipolar that is commonly known as major depression disorder.
I'm saying all of this just in case someone thinks that the medication is making her crazy or that she has some severe disorder that's making her act like that, and thereby excusing her abuse. People with mental illness have to work very hard just to function normally; our illness does not make us abusers or psychotic narcissists. We're all due to take responsibility for our ourselves and be accountable for our actions. The most I'd do when I'm feeling on edge (usually extremely irritable) is isolate myself, cry like a bitch, and then try to pick up the pieces. I don't even know what a doctor would diagnose her with, but jesus fuck I can't imagine abusing someone, manipulating the life out of them, then turn around and act like the victim.

comment:
You know if she'd just admit she as a mental problem and tell the truth that what she did were lies, I could accept that. Give her some modicum of understanding and empathy and move on. But I can't when she's been openly setting out to destroy him with a false narrative of spousal abuse. This is likely why the judge in the divorce case dismissed her TRO with prejudice because the truth according to her, wasn't on her side. 



"General Hospital" actor Maurice Benard who plays Sonny Corinthos stated he was struggling with his bi-polar disorder for the better part of ten years. He wasn't taking Lithium or anything until one night he pulled a gun on his wife Paula and their kids. Paula told him if he didn't get mental help and start taking his meds with more regularity she was going to take the kids and he would never see them again. She told him if he didn't care enough to get help, she didn't care enough to help him. And one cannot blame her. In this case if Heard's support staff didn't keep her on the keel, then no one is going to and I notice when she didn't have that support staff, that's where she got ugly. The only thing I have to fault Johnny on was why did she think she was good partner material? What was it about her he saw so lucrative and alluring he was willing to risk his sobriety and his sanity?
author: Dianne B. Dee

Thank god she did, because it proves Johnny's case beyond a doubt. It's got to be hard for ScAmber to keep up with all the lies and manipulation she spews, even her own recordings don't make it clear to her what happened that day, but it sure makes it clear for the rest of us! I thought it was interesting how Doctor Kipper said that the reason ScAmber didn't want Jerry to fly back with her is because he's a strong guy not easily manipulated. Everyone was placating her make-believe stories to her face in the moment, just to calm her down, but they all knew she was full of shit. You can hear it in their words, when they talk amongst themselves. Like Jerry said; she's no fool, she knows what she's doing. This was her game from the start and she went too far. She flipped the script at first, but the truth is here now, and she's only digging herself in deeper the more she elaborates. Her ever changing accusations are just plain pathetic now, and no one with half a brain should believe a proven habitual liar like her. Karma's a bitch, Amber...and it's nipping at your heels.

comment: Am I the only person who thinks Amber might be legitimately mentally unstable? Potentially bipolar? It wouldn‚Äôt excuse her abusing Johnny, but it would explain how she‚Äôs convinced herself she‚Äôs the victim despite her own evidence pointing to the contrary. I don‚Äôt 100% buy the argument that she‚Äôs a purely manipulative, spiteful, evil gold-digger (although I‚Äôm sure she cared about the money), I don‚Äôt think a sane person would put themselves through this huge public show off like this, knowing the truth and knowing how many people outside her marriage also knew the truth. It would also explain why Johnny was still trying to protect her from the scrutiny of the public when she first wanted to get a restraining order against him, the self-mutilation (cutting), why she was secretly recording conversations like this one, the medication and drugs she‚Äôs taking. Her possibly being sick doesn‚Äôt make what she did ok and she should definitely be punished for ruining an innocent man‚Äôs life and career, but it does make me feel bad for her when I read all the hateful comments about her on the internet. Whatever the truth, she‚Äôs still a human being, guys... Full disclosure, I am biased because my aunt is schizophrenic, and I know first hand what that type of illness can make people do.

comment:
I don't get how people like them, wind up in these types of supposedly abusive relationships.. At least, not in the traditional sense. People who _aren't_ multi-millionaires, are kinda financially trapped with their spouse. They might share ownership of their _only_ place to live with _them._ They may have kids to consider, and want to work things out for their sake..Sometimes, one or both isn't financially independent, so they may not feel like they can just break things off.. _(edit: They may also think that, after having kids and being older, they don't have the confidence or credentials to try to start a new relationship from scratch with someone else)_
_None_ of that applies here. Either one could walk out, and literally live in a luxury hotel (in Paris, Hawaii, etc..) for as long as they felt like it.

comment:
Thank you so much for all the work you've put into spreading the truth! 
So telling that he would say "he's (Jerry) not going to be manipulated"... as AH starts pathetically wailing in the background for sympathy. They knew what was up & thank everything he had ppl around him to interfere at times. She was definitely having an "episode", crying one second, fine the next. It's so creepy when ppl do that. I wish I could say I can't believe he put up with that for so long, but I can. Ppl like her play on the goodness of others, their hope that things can be better & desire to help them deal with their demons. It's so maddening with the lovebombing, blaming & gaslighting... takes one hell of strong person to deal with it & not completely break. I really hope Depp knows that. 
Listening to her & her bs... she's such a vile being! "I feel so bad" & yet STILL tries to blame him! "Oh I found these empty bags of coke"... nothing more than a sneak's way of damage control. Her admissions of the other drugs were just to seem truthful, but I think it was obvious she was full of it because she heard them mention the possibility of her doing coke. 
It's so awful that he went through this, but I really hope that all this evidence & how it's played out not only gets him the justice he deserves, but can also help others spot the red flags of abuse, see how it really is behind closed doors & know they are not alone üíó

comment: I can't wait for the trial. She will be left with nothing but her cheek implants.Don't you find it funny that the doctor and others treat amber like a mad dog that needs to calm down? A dog that has just bitten someone. How curious that the amber stans believe that the victim was her, clearly everyone is afraid of her because they have to send her home with a giant man in case she goes full crazy.  Her lawyers and The Sun are trying to smear him with anything at this point. I also believe that Elon Musk is part of this conspiracy against Johnny; Amber was a dealer and a stripper/ scort, right? and clearly had contacts with important people. She must have a lot of dirt on Musk, therefore it is not in his interest to be against her. Specially when he's been caught lying before,he doesn't care and may actually lie for amber's benefit. We already saw how on Twitter the Heard stans are trying to buy bots,I would't be surprised if that @stirgussa dude or whatever is being paid, or may even be one of her undercover friends, 'cause no one can be that delusional. I honestly think Elon is going to protect Heard and The sun newspaper.  People say she was violent towards Elon too, I don't buy that. They're both trash, I may even think they're into some sadomasochist  shit that's why she had those marks on her neck, and he had bruises on his cheek.. Y'all remember the messages between Grimes-Musk and Azalea Banks? He's rubbish... And we have to add that Amber lawyers at some point may try to use amber's mental illness as a strategy to avoid being locked up in jail. I think that leaking her medical record and the medications she uses is a strategy so that people believe that the only reason she is violent and a pathological liar is due to the use of medications...Like a secondary effect in wich she has no control over. Second, the #metoo movement will do anything to NOT let him win this case cause that would expose the huge trap of lies and hypocrisy that Hollywood is. That bitch deserves jail time. Raquel, Amanda, Whitney, and that disgusting human being called IIO too. I know he secretly likes to watch this videos, so here's a big FUCK YOU to you, IIO. You should have fixed your goddamn face with all the money you took from Johnny. XOXO.
